crypto_elements.implementation: Standard RC4 key scheduling and pseudorandom generation
Key Scheduling Algorithm with S-box initialization
crypto_elements.description: RC4 key scheduling with known weaknesses
RC4 keystream generation with statistical biases

primary_weakness: RC4 has multiple known vulnerabilities including key scheduling weaknesses, statistical biases, and related-key attacks
additional_notes: RC4 is deprecated and should not be used in new applications due to numerous cryptanalytic attacks
